data: It was at the close of an afternoon in May, that a party might have been seen gathered around a table covered with all those delicacies that, in the household of a rich Southern planter, are regarded as almost necessaries of life.
Webb, Frank J., 1828-1894; Stowe, Harriet Beecher, 1811-1896 [Author of introduction, etc.]
